guide.title: User Guide
guide.step1: Drag and drop images to the area above or click to select files
guide.step2: Select your desired output format (JPEG, PNG, WebP, etc.)
guide.step3: Apply filters if needed (Grayscale, Blur, Brightness, Contrast)
guide.step4: Check the result with Before/After preview
guide.step5: Click the download button to save the converted image
guide.inputDesc: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, HEIC, HEIF, SVG, ICO, TIFF
guide.outputDesc: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, AVIF
guide.feature2: Upload and process multiple images at once
guide.noteDesc: HEIC/HEIF formats are input-only and will be converted to other formats on output. RAW formats (RAF, ARW, CR2, etc.) currently require server-side processing.

errors.browserNotSupported: This feature is not supported in your browser

safety.title: Safe to Use
safety.description: All image processing happens in your browser. No data is stored on our servers.
safety.noStorageDesc: All images are deleted when you refresh the page
safety.browserOnlyDesc: Images are never sent to external servers

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Image Converting Editor values your privacy.
privacy.section1Content: This service does not collect any personal information. Your uploaded images are processed entirely within your browser and are never sent to or stored on our servers.
privacy.section2Content: This service does not store your images or data. When you refresh the page, all images and settings are reset. This is an intentional design to protect your privacy.
privacy.section3Content: This service displays Google AdSense advertisements. Google may use cookies to serve ads. We do not track any user data related to image processing.
privacy.section4Content: We use Google AdSense for displaying advertisements. For more information about Google's privacy practices, please refer to Google's Privacy Policy.
privacy.section5Content: All image processing is performed locally in your browser. Images are never transmitted to external servers, so you can use this service with confidence.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do you upload images to a server?
faq.a1: No, all image processing is done 100% in your browser. Images are never sent to external servers, so your privacy is completely protected.
faq.a2: Input formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, HEIC, HEIF, SVG, ICO, TIFF. Output formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, AVIF.
faq.a3: Yes, you can convert HEIC/HEIF images taken with iPhone to other formats like JPEG, PNG, WebP, etc.
faq.q4: What is the maximum file size?
faq.a4: We support files up to 100MB per file. Large files are processed directly in your browser, so no upload waiting time is needed.
faq.q5: Can I convert multiple images at once?
faq.a5: Yes, you can upload and batch convert up to 10 images at once. You can also apply different filters to each image.
faq.a6: Yes, for JPEG, WebP, and AVIF formats, you can adjust quality from 1% to 100%. Higher quality means larger file size.
faq.a7: Yes, our responsive design works perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and all devices.
faq.a8: Yes, it's completely free with no sign-up or login required. There are no usage limits.

formatComparison.title: Image Format Comparison
formatComparison.description: Compare the features of each image format to choose the right one for your needs.

whyUse.title: Why Use Image Converting Editor?
whyUse.subtitle: Fast, secure, and free online image conversion tool
whyUse.privacyDesc: Images are never sent to servers. All processing happens in your browser.
whyUse.speedDesc: Instant conversion with no upload waiting time. Handles large files quickly.
whyUse.freeDesc: Unlimited free use with no sign-up, login, or watermarks.
whyUse.noInstallDesc: Just use your web browser. No software installation required.
whyUse.mobileDesc: Works perfectly on smartphones and tablets.
whyUse.batchDesc: Convert up to 10 images at once.
